name: Essential Hover Effects
author: themebon

sections.description:
Checkout our Latest WordPress Themes – 100% Free

Essential Hover Effects plugin is a collection of over 50 beautiful Hover effects that helps you to easily create magnificent interactive IMAGES or GRID in your website

You can easily add hover effects using an image & embed them using shortcode in separate page or post.

Live Demo

Features

  • 50+ premium hover effects.
  • Bootstrap columns.
  • Each item for each effect per row
  • Select item column to be shown in a row
  • Custom image width.
  • Custom image height.
  • Custom hover item ordering.
  • 100% mobile respossive.
  • Fully shortcode powered.
  • Amazing shortcode generator when you update the post
  • Shortcode in widget supported
  • 700+ Google fonts for heading and description with parameter.
  • Custom font size for title and description.
  • Custom font style for title and description
  • Unlimited font color for title and description.
  • External link for each hover item.
  • Open link in new tab.
  • Custom CSS for each style.
  • Latest WordPress compatible.
  • 24/7 Support.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin.

After install, this plugin enable a custom post called E Hover Effects in wp dashboard menu. Click on Add New >> Add New Hover Item >> Set images and other info from settings >> Click on again Add New Hover Item for adding more item….
After adding items, click on publish from the right wp menu to publish the post, then you will see its post shortcode. Just copy shortcode from there and you are ready to use this shortcode in your post, page and widget.

Go to page > Add New. On the editor, just paste the shortcode. Enjoy!
